texts: You won't have to pay the Congestion Charge for vehicles added to the discount.
Vehicles will stay on the discount until it expires, unless you remove them.
When you renew the discount you must pay the £10 for every vehicle active on it at that time.
To see all vehicles on the discount go to ' Manage my accredited breakdown discount '.
You won't have to pay the Congestion Charge for vehicles added to the discount. Vehicles will stay on the discount until it expires, unless you remove them.
